index.title: Home
index.description: Frontend developer Felix Berger from Berlin.
index.aboutContent1: Hello, I'm Felix Berger. I'm an independent UI engineer living in Berlin, Germany.
index.aboutContent2: I build inclusive, easy to use and engaging products for the web and I offer 10 years of experience in frontend development.
index.skillsContent1: As a former information architect, I have the ability to bridge the gap between design and implementation. I build meaningful maintainable structures and interfaces that are both accessible and appealing.
index.skillsContent2: As a frontend developer with a decade of experience working on large scale frontends, I can support your project with clean, modern and framework agnostic code, knowledge of browsers and performance issues, the incorporation progressive enhancement and my ability to write specification.
index.skillsContent3: Logos: Performance, Accessibility, Design System / Architektur, Responsive
